---
# This file is autogenerated
title: assertSmartWalletClient
description: Overview of the assertSmartWalletClient method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/wallet-apis/functions/assertSmartWalletClient
---

Assertion function that throws an error if the client is not an Alchemy Smart Wallet Client.
After this function returns successfully, TypeScript will narrow the client type.

## Import

```ts
import { assertSmartWalletClient } from "@alchemy/wallet-apis";
```

## Parameters

### client

`Client`

- The client to assert

### message

`string`

- Custom error message if assertion fails
